ticket.title: Helper methods are not available in ActionMailer views
ticket.original-body:
It seems as if customer helper methods (i.e. defined in helpers/application_helper.rb) are not available in ActionMailer views. Whenever I use a helper method in a mailer it raises an error.
When I prefix my helper methods with "helper." it works, at least in the console. But when running my tests or app, the errors are raised again.
